Du velger selv hvor lenge adressen skal.value: You choose for how long the address will be valid, a maximum of 1 year. After 1 year, you must change or extend the address.

Er kontaktadressen din en vegadresse ell.value: Is your contact address a street address or PO box address?

Fra hvilken dato skal denne adressen bru.value: From what date should this address be used (dd.mm.yyyy)?

Fødselsnummer / D-nummer.value: Norwegian national identification number / D number

Har du annen dokumentasjon du ønsker å l.value: Do you have other documentation you want to submit?

Har du noen annen dokumentasjon du ønske.value: Do you have any other documentation you would like to submit?

Har du norsk fødselsnummer eller D-numme.value: Do you have a Norwegian national identification number / D number?

Hvis kontonummeret ditt allerede er regi.value:
If your account number is already registered with us, the money will be paid to this account number as long as you have been granted an application.

Have you not registered an account number with NAV? You will find information on how to register your account number on the website Change account number (opens in new tab) .

If you are unsure whether your account number is registered, you can check this by logging in to My page (Ditt NAV) or contact us on telephone 55 55 33 33.

Ja, jeg legger det ved denne søknaden..value: Yes, I will attach it to this application.

Jeg bekrefter at jeg har lest informasjo.value: I confirm that I have read the information about the bank account number and understand that I myself must ensure that my account number is registered with NAV.

Jeg ettersender dokumentasjonen senere (.value: I will send the documentation later (I am aware that NAV can not process the application until I have submitted the documentation)
I will send the documentation later (I am aware that NAV can not process the application until I have submitted the documentation).

Jeg ettersender dokumentasjonen senere..value: I will send the documentation later.

Jeg har levert denne dokumentasjonen tid.value: I have sent this documentation previously

Jeg legger det ved denne søknaden (anbef.value: I will attach it to this application (recommended)
I will attach it to this application (recommended).

NAV sender svar på søknad og annen kommu.value:
NAV sends answers to applications and other communication to your registered address.
You can check and change your registered address on the tax administration's website (opens in a new window) . If you wish to receive communication from NAV at an address other than your registered address, you can use the link above to enter a postal address in the National Register. You can also find a paper form for changing the postal address on the same page at the Tax Agency.

NAV sends answers to applications and other communication to your registered address.
You can check and change your registered address on the tax administration's website (opens in a new window) . If you wish to receive communication from NAV at an address other than your registered address, you can use the link above to enter a postal address in the National Register. You can also find a paper form for changing the postal address on the same page at the Tax Agency.

NAV tar kontakt med deg hvis vi ikke har.value: NAV will contact you if we do not have all the documentation we need.

Nei, jeg har ingen ekstra dokumentasjon.value: No, I have no additional documentation I want to submit.

Til hvilken dato skal denne adressen bru.value: To what date should this address be used (dd.mm.yyyy)?

Vegnavn og husnummer, evt. postboks.value: Street name and house number, or PO box

Velg det alternativet som gjelder deg.value: Choose the alternative that applies to you

Fødselsnummer eller d-nummer.value: Norwegian national identification number or d-number

invalid_email.value: {{field}} must be a valid email address.

checksumNotNumber.value: The IBAN is invalid because the checksum is not a number

dateNotLaterThanAllowedDate.value: The date can not be later than

dateNotBeforeAllowedDate.value: The date can not be earlier than

dateNotBeforeFromDate.value: The date cannot be earlier than {{fromDate}}

dateInBetween.value: Date cannot be earlier than {{minDate}} or later than {{maxDate}}

dateAfterFromDate.value: The date must be later than {{fromDate}}

fodselsnummerDNummer.value: This is not a valid Norwegian national identification number / D number

error.value: To proceed, you must correct the following:

invalidIBAN.value: The IBAN is invalid. Make sure you have entered it correctly.

noIBANCountry.value: The IBAN contains an invalid country code (should be two capital letters at the start of the code)

wrongIBANChecksum.value: The IBAN has an incorrect checksum. Make sure you have entered it correctly.

orgNrCustomError.value: You have entered an invalid organisation number

Dette er en tjeneste under utvikling.value: This is a service under development

Digital innsending er vanskelig på iPad.value: Digital submission is difficult on iPad and iPhone.

Du kan ikke lagre skjemaet underveis..value: The form cannot be saved before you are finished.

Du må fylle ut skjemaet digitalt, og så.value: You must fill in the form digitally, and then send it by mail.

Du må fylle ut skjemaet digitalt..value: You must fill in the form digitally.

En feil har oppstått. Vi kunne ikke last.value: An error has occured. We could not load the NAV units. Sorry for the inconvenience, please try again later.

Etter utfylling kan du velge mellom digi.value: After filling in, you can choose between digital submission (requires login) or send it by post. In both cases, you must download the completed form as a pdf file, which you can then either upload or print and send it by post.

Etter utfylling må du laste ned det ferd.value: After filling in, you must download the completed form as a pdf file, print it out, sign it and send it by mail.
After filling in, you must download the completed form as a pdf file.

Felt som ikke er obligatoriske er merket.value: Fields that are not required are marked with: (optional).

Følg instruksjonene på førstesidearket f.value: Follow the instructions on the cover sheet  to send the documents in the mail.

Førsteside kan ikke genereres før du har.value: The cover sheet cannot be generated until you have selected the NAV unit that will process your case

Førstesidearket inneholder viktig inform.value: The cover sheet contains important information about the NAV unit that will receive the documents and the address to which the documents should be sent.

Hvis du velger digital innsending må du.value: If you choose digital submission, you must download the form in the next step and upload it again after logging in.
If you choose digital submission, you must download the form and upload it again in the next step.

Hvordan vil du sende inn skjemaet?.value: How would you like to submit the form?

Send det hele til NAV i posten.value: Send it all to NAV in the mail

Velg hvilken NAV-enhet som skal motta in.value: Select the NAV unit that will process your case

Vennligst sjekk at alle opplysningene di.value: Please check that all your details are correct. If all the information is correct, you proceed to the next step.

Vær oppmerksom på dette før du begynner.value: Please note this before you start filling in the form

Hvis du fyller ut skjemaet på en offentl.value: If you fill in the form on a public PC, for example in a library, it is important that you close the browser when you have finished. This will prevent unauthorized persons from accessing the information you have entered into the form.

Informasjonen du fyller ut i skjemaet se.value: The information you fill in the form is not sent to NAV until you have completed the entire form and submitted it. If you close the window or browser, all the information you have entered will disappear.

Du må samtykke før du kan fortsette.value: You must consent before you can continue

Jeg bekrefter at opplysningene er riktig.value: I confirm that the information is correct.

{{label}} er deaktivert, og kan ikke vel.value: {{label}} is disabled, and cannot be selected.

Er du sikker på at du vil avbryte?.value: Are you sure you want to cancel?

Er du sikker på at du vil sende søknaden.value: Are you sure you want to submit the application now?
